attributes.additional_details:
In an announcement on its Facebook page, the venue says it will shut up shop for good by 31 August 2019, citing "many external factors" contributing to the club's... Let's not make another intimate venue close

Statement Link to website
http://dhpfamily.com/2019/05/live-music-venue-borderline-set-to-close/?fbclid=IwAR0kDIZdRi_-YvVx4VsZ3wZo9OJJsu3ljUk6YK3zwg5l7dIG6rttIQQDjqc
attributes.background: The Borderline — a venue beloved by indie music fans since opening in the early 1980s with many groups have played there, such as Oasis, Muse, REM and Blur — is set to close this summer.
